mapper.insert:
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t1_user_info ( `id`, `parent_user_id`, `parent_sys_id`, `name`, `account_no`, `password`, `user_status`, `phone_number`, `invite_code`, `favorite`, `ipaddress`, `level`, `team_num`, `team_num_1`, `team_num_2`, `team_num_3`, `task_end_time`, `REMARKS`, `created`, `updated`, `DEL_FLAG` ) values ( #{id}, #{parentUserId}, #{parentSysId}, #{name}, #{accountNo}, #{password}, #{userStatus}, #{phoneNumber}, #{inviteCode}, #{favorite}, #{ipaddress}, #{level}, #{teamNum}, #{teamNum1}, #{teamNum2}, #{teamNum3}, #{taskEndTime}, #{remarks}, sysdate(), sysdate(), 0 )
